// Input signature:

// -------------------- ----- ------ -------- -------- ------- ------
// SV_Position              0   xyzw        0      POS   float   xy  
// TEXCOORD                 0   xyzw        1     NONE   float       
// TEXCOORD                 1   xy          2     NONE   float       
//
//
// Output signature:
//
// Name                 Index   Mask Register SysValue  Format   Used
// -------------------- ----- ------ -------- -------- ------- ------
// SV_TARGET                0   xyzw        0   TARGET   float   xyzw
//
ps_5_0
dcl_globalFlags refactoringAllowed
dcl_constantbuffer cb13[133], immediateIndexed
dcl_sampler s0, mode_default
dcl_resource_texture2darray (float,float,float,float) t0
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t1
dcl_input_ps_siv linear noperspective v0.xy, position
dcl_output o0.xyzw
dcl_temps 3

// 3DMigoto StereoParams:
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t125

ld_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r2.xyzw, l(0, 0, 0, 0), t125.xyzw

ftoi r0.xy, v0.xyxx
mov r0.zw, l(0,0,0,0)
ld_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r0.x, r0.xyzw, t1.xyzw
mov r0.yw, l(0,1.000000,0,1.000000)
dp2 r0.z, r0.xyxx, cb13[42].zwzz
dp2 r0.y, r0.xyxx, cb13[43].zwzz
div r0.y, r0.z, r0.y
eq r0.z, cb13[132].y, l(1.000000)
movc r0.z, r0.z, r0.y, r0.x
add r1.xy, -cb13[109].yxyy, cb13[109].wzww
add r1.zw, v0.xxxy, -cb13[109].yyyx
div r1.xy, r1.zwzz, r1.xyxx
mad r0.xy, r1.xyxx, l(2.000000, -2.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000), l(-1.000000, 1.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000)
dp4 r1.x, r0.xyzw, cb13[36].xyzw
dp4 r1.y, r0.xyzw, cb13[37].xyzw
dp4 r1.z, r0.xyzw, cb13[38].xyzw
dp4 r1.w, r0.xyzw, cb13[39].xyzw
div r0.xyzw, r1.xyzw, r1.wwww

// WATCH_DOGS2 soft shadows fix inserted with DarkStarSword's asmtool.py:
// asmtool.py --fix-wd2-soft-shadows -i --only-autofixed 1a6af99e38ec4a24-ps.txt

add r2.w, r0.z, -r2.y
mul r2.w, r2.w, r2.x
mad r0.x, -r2.w, cb13[36].x, r0.x

dp4 r1.x, r0.xyzw, cb13[84].xyzw
dp4 r1.y, r0.xyzw, cb13[85].xyzw
dp4 r1.z, r0.xyzw, cb13[86].xyzw
dp4 r0.x, r0.xyzw, cb13[87].xyzw
div r0.xyz, r1.xyzx, r0.xxxx
mad r1.xy, -cb13[110].zwzz, l(2.000000, 2.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000), l(1.000000, 1.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000)
lt r1.zw, r1.xxxy, r0.xxxy
movc r0.xy, r1.zwzz, r1.xyxx, r0.xyxx
add r1.xy, cb13[110].zwzz, cb13[110].zwzz
lt r1.zw, r0.xxxy, r1.xxxy
movc r1.xy, r1.zwzz, r1.xyxx, r0.xyxx
mov r1.z, l(0)
sample_l_indexable(texture2darray)(float,float,float,float) r0.x, r1.xyzx, t0.xyzw, s0, l(0.000000)
div r0.y, cb13[129].z, cb13[119].z
log r0.y, |r0.y|
mul r0.y, r0.y, |cb13[119].w|
exp r0.y, r0.y
mad r0.y, cb13[119].y, r0.y, cb13[119].x
add_sat r0.y, -r0.y, r0.z
lt r0.x, r0.x, r0.y
add r0.y, -cb13[121].x, l(1.000000)
movc r0.x, r0.x, l(0), r0.y
add r0.y, -r0.x, l(1.000000)
mad o0.xyz, cb13[130].xxxx, r0.yyyy, r0.xxxx
mov o0.w, l(1.000000)
ret 
// Approximately 0 instruction slots used
